accountCreated: Yoooooo...account created. Email and password saved.
allDataDelete: All your data has been deleted.
byProceeding: By proceeding, you agree to give Rivers access to the image you choose to upload. Please make sure you have the right upload the image.
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
discordHintText: Enter your discord snowflake id to connect. Then Discord will be able to see your badges and demo packs.
discordIDMustBe10Digits: Discord ID must be at least 10 digits long.
genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
emailError: Please enter a valid email address.
emailWarning: I am an amateur programmer doing this in my spare time. I'm doing my best, but I can't guarantee privacy. Your email address may be visible to others.
enterAUsername: Enter a username for yourself. Many common names are still available.
helpMeCraft: Help me craft the perfect setlist and earn the setlist expert badge
letsFindSomethingForYourPlaylist: Let's find something for your playlist
logInToBuy: Please log in to buy this bundle.
no4StarTracks: No 4-star tracks. Rate tracks with 4 stars and they will appear here.
no5StarTracks: No 5-star tracks. Rate tracks with 5 stars and they will appear here.
noLyricsFound: No lyrics for this song yet. If you'd like to transcribe them, please give the lyrics to an archivist like King Tom tchansky@gmail.com.
noLyricsFoundBasic: No lyrics for this song yet.
noNewReleasesMessage: No recent releases. Check back soon!
passwordError: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
pleaseMake: Please make sure your words are spelled correctly or use less or different keywords.
pleaseClickEmailLink: Please click on the link in the email I just sent you and then try to log in.
areYouSureRemoveAllDownloads: Are you sure you want to remove all your downloaded tracks? This will free up space on your device but you'll need to re-download any tracks you want to listen to offline.
thisWillRemoveAllYourDownloadedTracks: This will remove all your downloaded tracks but won't affect your library.
resetPasswordInstructions: If you forgot your password, type your email address in the field above and then click this reset password button. I'll send you an email with the form to set a password.
somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong, please try again later.
submitToWeezifyInstructions:
These are the best of y'alls demos.

If you're a new submitter, email assistant@riverscuomo.com and someone will create a Google Drive folder for you.
Name the folder with your exact Weezify username to connect your music to your Weezify account.
To add your demos, upload your files to your Google Drive Folder that was created for you. Note that flac files will not work.
Your music will be copied into the Dropbox folder for you.
Songs will show up in Weezify once Rivers runs the script to add the Dropbox folder contents to the Weezify database.
(You may need to remind him. It no longer runs every night automatically).
title: Title
unverifiedEmail: Your email address is not verified.
verifyEmail: I just sent you an email to verify your email address. It's probably in your spam folder. Please click the link in the email and then come back here to continue.
whatDoYouWantToListenTo: What do you want to listen to?
whoDoYouWantToSee: Who do you want to see?

youCanFree: You can free up storage by clearing your cache. Your downloads won't be removed.
